metadata.title: CVE-2018-12108 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in Dropbox Lepton 1.2.1. The validateAndCompressfunction in validation.cc allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (SIGFPE and application crash) via a malformed file.

criterions.comment: lepton: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
